details.title: The Great Gatsby
details.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
details.summary: A story about the American dream and the disillusionment of the Jazz Age.

details.author: George Orwell
details.summary: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian regime under constant surveillance.

details.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
details.author: Harper Lee
details.summary: A novel about the serious issues of race and class in the Deep South.

details.title: Brave New World
details.author: Aldous Huxley
details.summary: A novel that presents a future society driven by technological advancements and social stability.

details.title: Moby Dick
details.author: Herman Melville
details.summary: A tale of obsession and revenge as Captain Ahab hunts the elusive white whale, Moby Dick.
